text: The handmaidens of Queen Neferata herself; as beautiful as deadly.
The elite of the Black Knights bringing death from the skies on top of their skeletal hellsteeds.
The animated remains of long dead warriors, Skeletons rise from the grave to serve their Master. They are slow, but relentless, marching ever on and on.
A horde of ethereal ghosts and vengeful apparitions that drift towards their warm-blooded victims with terrible inevitability.
Champions of the Blood Knights, the Kastellans are nigh indestructible, riding with fangs bared through storms of arrow and shot.
